column6: In this special two-part story, celebrated artist Eddie Campbell (From Hell) joins Robert Morales! Captain America finds himself at the crossroads where his past and a possible future meet when he's faced with a super-villain from his alternate future. As the battle royale commences, Cap finds an ally in the future's one and old Captain America: the TRUTH's very own Isaiah Bradley!
column8: | penciller:Eddie Campbell | penciller (cover):Dave Johnson | writer:Robert Morales | colorist:Brian Reber
